<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Encoding Node Formatting

Represents a special `__ENCODING__` keyword

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Works

Before:

```ruby
__ENCODING__
```

After:

```ruby
__ENCODING__
```

## Formats as an arg

Before:

```ruby
def encode(encoding = __ENCODING__); end
```

After:

```ruby
def encode(encoding = __ENCODING__); end
```
